tool_description: Validates photo availability and quality for venues to ensure visual representation meets standards.

venue_ids.description: Array of venue IDs to validate photos for

minimum_photos.description: Minimum number of photos required per venue

error_messages: Invalid photo categories: Use standard categories like exterior, interior, ceremony_space, reception_area, kitchen, restroom.
Too few photos available: Some venues don't meet minimum photo requirements.
Photo access error: Unable to access photo galleries for some venues.
Invalid minimum count: minimum_photos must be between 1 and 50.
usage: Provide venue_ids to validate photo availability. Optionally specify photo_categories and minimum_photos to set validation criteria.

photo_counts.description: Number of photos available for each venue

category_coverage.description: Photo category coverage status for each venue

quality_ratings.description: Photo quality assessment for each venue
